Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides information regarding geological heritage in South Yorkshire and Sheffield City Region, including the Peak Park. Includes the South Yorkshire Regionally Important Geological and Geomorphological Sites (RIGS) Group which is the geological conservation group for Barnsley, Doncaster, Rotherham and Sheffield, as well as the Sheffield Building Stones group. SAGT holds and maintains the Geological Records for Barnsley, Doncaster, Rotherham and Sheffield. Acts as the administrative point of contact for the Barnsley Local Geological Sites Panel, Rotherham Local Geological Sites Panel, Sheffield Local Geological Sites Partnership and South Yorkshire Geodiversity Trusts, Geoconservation UK and the Yorkshire and Humber Geodiversity Forum.
